org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.nfq.features.type

Class DiscretizedFeatures

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.nfq.features.type.DiscretizedFeatures
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, DimensionFeatures
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiscretizedTemperatureFeatures

    public class DiscretizedFeatures
extends Object
implements DimensionFeatures, Serializable
    This class discretizes a given state or action variable. The cell containing the state or action variable is set to MAX_NEURON_ACT, all others are set to MIN_NEURON_ACT.
    Author:
    Michel Tokic
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
